evidence.text:
Person A: I had a word with doctor Supriya.
Person A: Oh no Parvaty, what did you do?

Person A: But when did he speak to you last?
Person B: Maybe... last year... or I think a little bit more. He called to wish me for Onam.
Person A: You know Nurse, when people live abroad for a long time, they can lose their mind or memory. It happens like that.
Person A: What are you going to do?
Person B: Good for nothing lout...drunkard, like his father, isn’t it? Its good you don’t have kids, nurse... they are more of a burden than any help.
Person B: What ? Of course there is Parvaty..We can still-
Person B: We would know.... If you vanished... all of us at the hospital. We will miss you.
Person A: You are the youngest, isn’t it!

Person A: You can take me to the city but I won’t forget my traditional dishes.
Person A: The bungalow is an hour away from here. If I leave now, I can be back by 5...I only need to tell them I’m here for the job...
Person B: She should hold on to him if he followed her this far.
